title: Camp General Basilio Navarro
text:
Camp General Basilio Navarro serves as the main operating base of the <a href="Armed%20Forces%20of%20the%20Philippines">Armed Forces of the Philippines</a> (AFP) for the Southwest Philippines, the Headquarters of its <a href="AFP%20Western%20Mindanao%20Command">Western Mindanao Command</a> (WESTMINCOM).
History.
Camp Navarro has hosted the <a href="AFP%20Southern%20Command">Southern Command</a> (SOUTHCOM) of the AFP for decades. In 2005, news came that SOUTHCOM was to be moved to <a href="Pagadian%20City">Pagadian City</a>, which was met with wide protest by Zamboanga residents. This eventually led to a review of the AFP's organization.
By August 2006, then AFP Chief of Staff Gen. <a href="Hermogenes%20Esperon">Hermogenes Esperon</a> announced that the Southern Command of the AFP will be divided into the Western Mindanao Command and the <a href="AFP%20Eastern%20Mindanao%20Command">Eastern Mindanao Command</a> (EASTMINCOM). WESTMINCOM's joint service headquarters was to be located in Camp Navarro, while EASTMINCOM in <a href="Camp%20Panacan">Camp Panacan</a> in <a href="Davao%20City">Davao City</a>.
Camp Navarro also plays an important role in the , and has hosted the U.S. Joint Special Operations Task Force – Philippines (JSOTF-P). The camp was also the venue of a number of BALIKATAN Philippines - U.S. military joint exercises.
Description.
Camp Navarro is located in Calarian district of <a href="Zamboanga%20City">Zamboanga City</a>. West of the base is the Zamboanga Golf and Country Club. Camp Navarro is also 2 km west of the <a href="Philippine%20Air%20Force">Philippine Air Force</a>'s <a href="Zamboanga%20International%20Airport">Edwin Andrews Air Base</a>. 
Camp Navarro is adjacent to the <a href="Philippine%20Navy">Philippine Navy</a>'s <a href="Naval%20Station%20Romulo%20Espaldon">Naval Station Romulo Espaldon</a>, which is the headquarters of the <a href="Naval%20Forces%20Western%20Mindanao">Naval Forces Western Mindanao</a>.
Current facilities on base are:
 Current Commanding Officer: LTC CAESAR ALMER E CANDELARIA MC (GSC) PA
